item.title: [EN] Ingresos por exportaciones de estatal venezolana PDVSA fueron 17.520 millones de dólares en 2024: documento - Reuters
item.description:
Translated:

Revenues from exports of Venezuelan state-owned PDVSA were 17.52 billion dollars in 2024: Reuters document
